A

addClient(ClientHandler) - Static method in class Server.ChatServer
Adds a new client to the list of connected clients.

B

broadcast(String, ClientHandler) - Static method in class Server.ChatServer
Broadcasts a message to all connected clients except the sender.
broadcastAll(String) - Static method in class Server.ChatServer
Broadcasts a message to all connected clients including the sender.
broadcastFile(String, byte[], ClientHandler) - Static method in class Server.ChatServer
Broadcasts a file to all connected clients except the sender.

C

ChatClient - Class in Client
ChatClient is the client application for connecting to the chat server.
ChatClient() - Constructor for class Client.ChatClient
 
ChatServer - Class in Server
ChatServer is the main server application for the multi-client chat system.
ChatServer() - Constructor for class Server.ChatServer
 
Client - package Client
 
ClientHandler - Class in Server
ClientHandler manages communication with a single connected client.
ClientHandler(Socket) - Constructor for class Server.ClientHandler
Constructs a new ClientHandler for the given socket connection.
closeConnection() - Method in class Server.ClientHandler
Closes the client connection gracefully.
createUsersTable() - Static method in class Server.DatabaseManager
Creates the users table if it doesn't exist Stores username and hashed password for authentication

D

DatabaseManager - Class in Server
DatabaseManager handles all database operations for the chat system.
DatabaseManager() - Constructor for class Server.DatabaseManager
 

G

getAllMessages(String) - Static method in class Server.DatabaseManager
Retrieves all messages from the database in chronological order.
getClients() - Static method in class Server.ChatServer
Gets the list of all connected clients.
getClientSocket() - Method in class Server.ClientHandler
 
getFormatter() - Static method in class Server.ClientHandler
Gets the formatter for timestamp formatting.
getUsername() - Method in class Server.ClientHandler
Gets the username of this client.

I

insertMessage(String, String, String, String, String, String) - Static method in class Server.DatabaseManager
Inserts a new message into the database.

M

Main method that starts the chat client.

Main method that starts the chat server.

R

registerUser(String, String) - Static method in class Server.DatabaseManager
Registers a new user with username and password.
removeClient(ClientHandler) - Static method in class Server.ChatServer
Removes a client from the list of connected clients.
run() - Method in class Client.ServerListener
Main execution method for the listener thread.
run() - Method in class Server.ClientHandler
Main execution method for the client handler thread.

S

sendFile(String, byte[]) - Method in class Server.ClientHandler
Sends a file to this specific client.
sendPrivateMessage(String, String, String, ClientHandler) - Static method in class Server.ChatServer
Sends a private message from one user to another.
sendText(String) - Method in class Server.ClientHandler
Sends a message to this specific client.
Server - package Server
 
ServerListener - Class in Client
ServerListener runs in a separate thread on the client side to continuously listen for incoming messages from the chat server.
ServerListener(Socket) - Constructor for class Client.ServerListener
Constructs a new ServerListener for the given socket.
shutdown(boolean) - Static method in class Server.ChatServer
Shuts down the server gracefully by notifying all clients and closing connections.

U

userExists(String) - Static method in class Server.DatabaseManager
Checks if a username exists in the database.

V

verifyPassword(String, String) - Static method in class Server.DatabaseManager
Verifies if a password matches the stored hash for a user.
